tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    client_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    client_phone VARCHAR(15),
    client_address VARCHAR(100),
    wealth_manager_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (wealth_manager_id) REFERENCES wealth_managers(wealth_manager_id)
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    address TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES clients(client_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Clients (
    client_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(50),
    client_email VARCHAR(100),
    client_phone VARCHAR(15),
    client_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
    account_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES Clients(client_id),
    account_type VARCHAR(50),
    account_balance DECIMAL(10, 2),
    account_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID REFERENCES Accounts(account_id),
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE clients (client_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(50), last_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(20), address VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE accounts (account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, client_id INT, account_type VARCHAR(50), balance DECIMAL(10, 2), FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id))
CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, transaction_date DATE, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts(account_id))

CREATE TABLE employees (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(50), last_name VARCHAR(50), role VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (role) REFERENCES roles(role))

CREATE TABLE Client_information (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(50),
    client_address VARCHAR(100),
    client_phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    client_email VARCHAR(50),
    client_balance DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Account_information (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    account_type VARCHAR(50),
    account_balance DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Client_information(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Account_information(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_audit (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    audit_date TIMESTAMP,
    audit_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee_information(employee_id)
);
